inclusion.criterion: Age 18-65 years and chronic HCV infection.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Group A: Patients with hepatitis C (Non-cirrhotic) [n= 150]
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Group B: Patients with hepatitis C related compensated-cirrhosis [n= 150]
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Current overt hepatic encephalopathy or during the last 1 month
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has HCV cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, and recent admission for UGIB. He is off ETOH for a year.
